SEARCH
Package koopa.core.streams

Class LimitedStream

java.lang.Object
koopa.core.streams.StreamDecorator
koopa.core.streams.LimitedStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
Stream
public class LimitedStream extends StreamDecorator implements Stream
This stream will only return tokens from its parent stream up to a certain point, as defined by its limiters.

  • Field Details

    • SILENCE

      private static final boolean SILENCE
      The matching of limiters can introduce a lot of noise in the logging, so I disable it by default. Toggle this to get the output.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • limiters

      private Map<ParserCombinator,Integer> limiters
      Limiters are additive. Whenever any limiter matches the forward() method should return null.

    • mru

      private LinkedList<ParserCombinator> mru
      This lists the limiters in the order or Most-Recently-Used. This is the order in which they will be matched.

      public Data forward()
      Get the next data in the stream.

      This will force any delayed markers. Cfr. Stream.insert(Marker).

    • peekMore

      public String peekMore()
      This is for tracing purposes. Gives a textual representation of up to five upcoming tokens.
